> Hydras:
> 
> "Try to not be noticed" said Hydras "I dont want unpleasants 
> visitors here"

Myrmidon nodded and turned, his wings flowing behind him like a regal
cloak. IN the deepening shadows Myrmidon's helm bore a vague resemlance
to a crown as his optics glowed balefully out from the deep,
impenatrable shadows of his faceplate. Silently and yet swiftly
Myrmidon's long strides carried him to the entrance way. 

He took a moment to look around, careful not to give away the base's
position. Then with a leap Myrmidon moved into the air and shifted
form, becoming a rather large eagle. 

With powerful flaps Myrmidon is quickly airbourne and in flight in the
direction of Atlantis. 

OOC: Not sure how far Atlantis is from Hydras' base, so will arrive
next post.

Preston
(Myrmidon)
